Package net.sourceforge.pebble.webservice

Class Summary
AbstractAPIHandler A handler for the XML-RPC blogging APIs.
BloggerAPIHandler A handler for the Blogger API (accessed via XML-RPC).
MetaWeblogAPIHandler A handler for the MetaWeblog API (accessed via XML-RPC).
PebbleAPIHandler A handler for the Pebble API (accessed via XML-RPC).
PebbleAtomHandler Implementation of a handler for the Atom Publishing Protocol.
PebbleAtomHandlerFactory  
SearchAPIHandler Extension to allow search and query of Blog posting via XML-RPC.
UpdateNotificationPingsClient A simple client to ping (notify) sites like weblogs.com when this blog has been updated.
XmlRpcAuthenticationException An exception used to represent authentication problems with XML-RPC.
